programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o dbfsamp.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2
instr 1
iamp = p4 idb = dbfsamp(iamp) print idb asig vco2 iamp, 110 ;sawtooth outs asig, asig
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 1 1 i 1 + 1 100 i 1 + 1 1000 i 1 + 1 10000 i 1 + 1 30000 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
